DOC.brief_summary: Laparoendoscopic single site cholecystectomy is associated with better cosmetic results and recovery compare to laparoscopic cholecystectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation of Laparoendoscopic Single Site Versus Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
